title: Microsoft’s AI spending and disappointing cloud growth overshadow strong profits
description: Revenue rises 17% to $81bn but 66% surge in capital expenditures revives debate about returns on vast AI costs
content: Revenue rises 17% to $81bn but 66% surge in capital expenditures revives debate about returns on vast AI costs
